fpmExplorer:Page.title: Chart
fpmExplorer:Page.introduction: The Chart building block enables you to render a chart based on an entitySet or a specific navigation property.

fpmExplorer:ImplementationStep.title: Chart Definition
fpmExplorer:ImplementationStep.text: The UI.Chart annotation defines the chart type, dimensions, and measures.

fpmExplorer:ImplementationStep.title: Analytics Configuration
fpmExplorer:ImplementationStep.text: Analytics aggregated properties define the measures that can be used in the chart.
